column5: they are all liars and cheats. we're screwed no matter what one of those clowns get in.
I'm with Lew on this one.I've always voted for over 30 years but this election i've had enough!

The NWT is a small place and I have met most of the candidates personally and I know who I'm voting for and no matter what the party leaders say they will never sway my vote because for the most part they can't be believed. My choice is based on local performance and the fact he has nothing to do with the red or blue parties!! If you want my vote don't align yourself with those lying buggers.  Nuff said!!    :tease:
Who do you think is saying the most? I mean content not verbage
I missed my invite...
Can't watch it, as I left my waders at the lake....
tonights is English so you can tune in or wate for the French one.  PS, I would have needed you there beside me Paul to tell me what the hell they were saying...

WAS GONNA SAY FLORO WHEN I READ THE HEADLINER FIRST  LOL  BUT REALLY DOES IT MATTER. THEY ALL MAKE PROMISES AND NEVER COME THREW. MIGHT AS WELL VOTE ME IN. COULDNT REALLY SCREW IT UP MUCH MORE THEN THEY ALREADY DO  LOL
I'M english Geoff, but the french one, for someone like me who speaks french, is gonna be a real hoot. All that broken french, and accent is gonna be funny as heck
Yeah,same bull crap every time.Those that vote and think it makes a dif. Havent seen one thing that has made me say,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,      Ya I vote ,just cause I can
The French debate was to be Wednesday night but it was pushed to Thursday because of the hockey.
I thought this was going to be about mono vs flouro
Thank God it's nearly over.  But now we'll have to listen to the news pundits analyze it to death for the next 3 weeks.
Ya gotta love us Kebecers eh Roy? 'Touche pas notre hockey hoste!!'
Too bad Gilles Duceppe does'nt run for a federal party across Canada---He gets right to the point
Glad that's over, bring on the hockey.
That was the smartest political move in ten years.
Can the stage be anymore 70's looking?
Clarification: The french debate was changed to Wednesday because of hockey on Thursday.

Can't stomach any of them. Why waste time wactching them on the tube. Nothing but idiots. Wish I could find one of them worth my vote, going to be tough to decide, and no the torture of listening to them debate would not help to sway me.  Might as well have this dude run for federal politics, can't screw up any more than the others. Brother Mike
I'm just curious if anyone else's lower body sphinctor tightened like mine did when Iggy started ranting about gun control?

I think the Liberals are pretty much done after Count Iggies performance, party loyalties aside I can`t believe how anybody could vote for this guy. Missing 70% of the votes in the house is shameful. Part time Canadian looking for a new part time gig, well Mr.Ignatief the office of the Prime Minister of Canada is not a part time gig so back to Boston with ya!

I've voted in every municipal, provincial & federal election for more than 40 years but the last time I voted, was definetely the LAST time I'll ever vote again.  It's just getting too tough to pick the best of the worst anymore and I've got far more important things to occupy my mind.

I watched the whole thing last night, kinda waiting for the train wreck to take place. Human nature forces one to watch disasters as they unfold... Best line of the night, I thought anyway, was from Layton. Now I am not a fan of the guy, but I do appreciate a good line. Layton to Harper... as best my memory serves... Mr. Harper, we don't need anymore penitentiaries, the folks in the Senate are quite happy where they are! HH
Yes that was a good one!

They came off much better than last time with Elizabeth May there talking facts and figures looking like she was the only  person in the room that knew what was going on.  My local rep. is a member of the "tough on crime as long as we're not the ones doing the crime" party and says he's not interested in federal issues, probably because he's not allowed to talk about them, and wants to concentrate on local issues, so I'll give him a vote when he runs for council.
console!
